fastq_pairs.description: A list of structs containing fastq pairs and read groups. The struct field names are: fastq_1, fastq_2, and read_group.

inputKnownSitesVCF.description: Path to a known indels file. The file must be in vcf.gz format.

aws_region.description: aws region (e.g. us-east-1). must match were source data is located and where workflow is executed
